alert.note: Alert for Clark; Pike (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued October 12 at 6:03PM CDT until October 12 at 6:45PM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: The National Weather Service in Little Rock has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Clark County in southwestern Arkansas... Eastern Pike County in southwestern Arkansas... * Until 645 PM CDT. * At 602 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Narrows Dam, or 8 miles northeast of Murfreesboro, moving southeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Gurdon... Okolona... Beirne... Halfway... Delight... Antoine... Bear Creek Public Use Area... Burtsell... Curtis... Kirby... Shawmut... Pike City... HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
